## Lift Anything (NSMBU Version) [mkwcat]

Lift literally anything in the game.
Pick up whatever actor is nearest to you when you shake,
regardless of whether or not it can normally be picked up.

This code is for New Super Mario Bros. U. Please read the [README](README.md) in the current directory for how to use this code.

<details>
